heading.welcome_to_venmail_file: 欢迎使用 Venmail 文件管理器

text.deleted_files_will_appear: 已删除的文件将出现在这里，可以恢复或永久删除。
text.login_to_access_your: 登录以访问您的垃圾箱并管理已删除的文件。
text.preparing_your_deleted_items: 正在准备您的已删除项目……
text.preview_not_available_for: Preview not available for this item
text.this_will_permanently_delete: This will permanently delete all {{ trashItems.length }} items in the trash. This action cannot be undone.
text.this_will_permanently_delete_2: This will permanently delete {{ selectedFiles.size }} item(s). This action cannot be undone.
text.try_adjusting_your_search: 尝试调整您的搜索或过滤器以查找特定项目。

placeholder.id_like_to_view: I’d like to view this document.

text.access_request_sent_you: Access request sent. You will receive an email when approved.
text.request_sent_if_the: Request sent (if the email is valid).
text.request_submitted_please_check: Request submitted. Please check your email later.
text.start_a_conversation_with: 与您的协作者开始对话。
text.tip_hold_and_click: Tip: Hold ⌘ and click to open the link.
text.tip_hold_ctrl_and: Tip: Hold Ctrl and click to open the link.
text.you_dont_have_access: 您没有访问此文档的权限。输入您的电子邮件以请求所有者的访问权限。
text.your_document_is_still: Your document is still empty. Add content before saving.

text.choose_a_template_or_start_blank: 选择一个模板或从空白开始
text.get_started_by_creating: 通过创建新文档或上传现有文档开始。

text.try_adjusting_your_search: 尝试调整您的搜索或过滤条件。

heading.choose_who_in_your: 选择谁可以在您的工作区打开或编辑此表单。
heading.embed_your_form_or: 嵌入您的表单或通过公共插入 API 提交条目。
heading.send_the_live_form: 发送实时表单链接并控制谁可以回复。

placeholder.add_a_description_to: Add a description to help people understand your form...
placeholder.describe_what_questions_you: Describe what questions you want to add...

text.add_questions_customize_fields: 添加问题，自定义字段，创建满足您需求的完美表单。
text.any_custom_events_you: 您定义的任何自定义事件
text.anyone_with_the_link: 任何拥有链接的人都可以回复。
text.delete_this_form_this: Delete this form? This action cannot be undone.
text.failed_to_update_public: Failed to update Public API settings
text.form_published_but_share: Form published but share slug is unavailable
text.form_published_share_link: Form published. Share link copied to clipboard.
text.form_will_not_accept: Form will not accept new submissions.
text.manage_who_in_your: 管理谁可以在您的工作区打开和编辑此表单。
text.only_people_in_your: Only people in your organization (and invited collaborators) can access this form.
text.only_the_form_owner: Only the form owner can update payment settings when using platform payments.
text.payments_can_be_configured: 付款可以在 1 美元到 100 美元之间配置。
text.provide_a_secure_https: 提供安全的HTTPS端点，我们将在所选事件发生时POST签名有效负载。您可以随时暂停交付。
text.publishing_form_to_generate: 正在发布表单以生成分享链接…
text.send_form_responses_and: 实时将表单响应和支付事件发送到您的下游系统。
text.share_link_unavailable_publish: Share link unavailable. Publish the form to get a shareable link.
text.unable_to_copy_link: Unable to copy link. Try copying manually.
text.unable_to_generate_share: Unable to generate share slug. Please publish manually.

text.something_went_wrong_while: Something went wrong while confirming the payment. Please try again.
text.we_are_still_processing: We are still processing your payment. You will receive an update shortly.
text.your_response_has_been: Your response has been submitted and the payment is confirmed.

text.authentication_required_to_preview: Authentication required to preview this form.
text.could_not_create_response: Could not create response. Please try again.
text.could_not_start_payment: Could not start payment flow. Please retry.
text.this_form_is_not: This form is not publicly accessible yet. Publish to allow submissions.
text.we_will_ask_for: 我们将询问您的电子邮件地址，以便发送确认和收据。

heading.review_submission_metadata_and: 查看提交元数据和答案。

text.manage_submissions_monitor_payment: 管理提交，监控支付状态，并深入了解个别答案。
text.monitor_how_respondents_engage: 监控响应者如何与您的表单互动，并发现完成状态的趋势。
text.no_answers_captured_for: 此响应未捕获任何答案。
text.no_responses_yet_share: 尚无响应。分享您的表单以开始收集提交。
text.visualize_completion_ratio_at: 一目了然地可视化完成比例

heading.share_this_form_with: 使用下面的链接与参与者或协作者分享此表单。

text.anyone_with_this_link: 任何拥有此链接的人都可以根据其发布设置访问表单。
text.failed_to_publish_form: Failed to publish form for sharing
text.publish_the_form_to: 发布表单以获取可分享链接。
text.publishing_form_to_generate: 正在发布表单以生成分享链接…
text.share_link_copied_to: 分享链接已复制到剪贴板。
text.the_form_link_was: 表单链接已复制到您的剪贴板。
text.unable_to_copy_link: 无法复制链接。请手动复制。
text.unable_to_generate_share: 无法生成分享 slug。请手动发布。
